description:
We know you live on the go, so here is your TV your way!
Take your TV wherever you go & watch whenever you want. Whatever your genre is, we have the content & experience designed for easy viewing!

Explore the  app to unleash a truly personalized experience. Watch LIVE TV & Manage packs in 8 languages: English, Hindi, Bengali, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Tamil & Telugu.

World of convenience at your fingertips
Want to Recharge, add channels, or reach us? Possible now, with just a tap!
● Manage account: Add or drop channels and change your subscription whenever you want.
● Recharge: Unlock a​ hassle-free way to recharge - pay using Credit/Debit Cards, net-banking, popular Wallets & UPI apps and more.
● Get ​Help: ​Use the Get Help & Chat Assistant to resolve your issues immediately – check your bills & payments, profile & account-related activity, raise & track requests/complaints.

Watch 600+ TV Channels
With just one Tata Play subscription, you can log in with up to 10 devices & watch simultaneously on 2 devices.

Watch the available shows on the go - anytime anywhere!

Choose from 600+ channels and watch 24x7 -

o Sports – Star Sports, Sony Sports Ten 1 HD, Sports18, Eurosports, etc.
o News – Aaj Tak, ABP News, India TV, Republic TV, Times Now, etc.
o Entertainment –  SET, Sony SAB TV, Star Plus, Colors, Zee TV, &TV, Tata Play Comedy, etc.
o Kids - Disney, Cartoon Network, Pogo, Nickelodeon, Discovery Kids, etc.
o Movies & Music - Sony Max, Star Gold, &Pictures, Zee Cinema, 9xM, B4U Music, MTV, etc.
o Devotional - Aastha TV, Sanskar TV, Darshan 24, Saadhna TV, Fateh TV, etc.
o Lifestyle & infotainment - TravelXP, Discovery, History TV, Tata Play Astro Duniya, etc.
o Education – Discovery Science, Sony BBC Earth, Tata Play Fun Learn, Tata Play JEE & NEET prep by Vedantu, etc.
o Regional – Zee Marathi, Star Pravah, Sun TV, Zee Kannada, Zee Bangla, Zee Telugu, etc.

Get something for everyone!

o The serial watcher
Daily shows - Daily shows - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah, Bhabiji Ghar Par Hain! Anupama, Crime Patrol, Bhagya Lakshmi, Kundali Bhagya.
Reality shows – Kaun Banega Crorepati, Khatron ke Khiladi etc. Never miss an episode with FREE catch-up.

o The Movie fans
Watch Star Gold, Zee Cinema, Sony Max, Colors Cineplex, KTV, Goldmines or ad-free Tata Play Services. Movies from the golden era on Tata Play Classic Cinema, latest movies on Bollywood Premiere, the best of Hollywood on Hollywood Local, and more.


o The sports enthusiasts
With 13+ channels, catch sporting action live & never miss your favorite sport like Cricket, Tennis, Kabaddi, Hockey, Badminton, Tennis, Football & more.

o The explorers 
Watch a preview of most channels and Tata Play Services at no additional cost, explore one of the world’s best content, browse 3-day program listings, read synopsis & make your own watchlist.


o The OTT Lovers
With Tata Play Binge, you can now enjoy top OTT Apps like Disney+ Hotstar, Prime Video, ZEE5, Discovery+, Apple TV+, Lionsgate Play, Fancode & more – All in one subscription! You can also enjoy Netflix with your Tata Play subscription with our Netflix combos.



o Exclusive access to Tata Play Specials
Tata Play Specials is our unique offering of curated content on TV & Tata Play Mobile App, without any ad breaks. Watch latest Bollywood movies first time on TV, old classic movies & TV shows, best of cartoons, LIVE darshan, Korean dramas, action thriller stories, mythological shows, Hollywood movies in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu & lot more across our 45+ destinations.


Activate the app with your existing Tata Play account & enjoy.

Reach out to us at help@tataplay.com for any queries/feedback etc.
title: tata sky is now tata play

description:
Experience Drama Like Never Before with Drama Plus

Dive into a world of captivating short dramas and films, each thoughtfully crafted to last just a minute. Perfect for when you're on the go, unwinding at home, or enjoying a coffee break, Drama Plus offers quick yet unforgettable storytelling that fits effortlessly into your day.

Discover the Features That Set Us Apart:
* Stunning High-Definition Collection:
Immerse yourself in an expansive library of short dramas and films, inspired by novels and brought to life in breathtaking HD. With fresh updates regularly added, you'll always have something new to explore.

* Diverse Storylines for Every Taste:
From heartwarming urban romances to epic tales of mythical doctors, powerful CEOs, royal intrigues, and legendary gods of war, Drama Plus delivers stories that captivate every kind of drama lover.

* Smart Recommendations, Just for You:
Our advanced recommendation engine curates the perfect lineup of original shorts and novel-based adaptations, tailored to your unique preferences.

* User-Friendly Interface:
Navigate effortlessly with our sleek and intuitive design, making it easy to discover your next favorite drama in seconds.

* Flexible Viewing Anywhere:
Watch on your mobile device or cast to your smart TV for a cinematic experience that’s perfect for any setting.

* Exclusive Originals:
Enjoy premium, original dramas and films you won’t find anywhere else.

Why Wait? Start Watching Now!
Download Drama Plus today and indulge in a universe of stories that move you, amaze you, and leave you wanting more—all in just a minute!

description:

Popular videos, various dramas, live, NAVER Clip all in one place!

See you at NAVER TV, a place where fun videos gather.

- Enjoy live cultural performances such as musicals and plays.

description:
Want to discover the world differently? Watch videos now on Dailymotion. Stay in the loop by following your friends, favorite channels, and partners. Easily keep up with the things that interest you and watch tv shows, news, and sports from your phone. Dailymotion is a video platform made for you. Feel free to scroll in a safe environment!  
Explore the new redesigned and intuitive home feed and follow feed:  
Follow video updates from your favorite channels.  
Curate a community and feed around what interest you by interacting with different videos and channels. 
Join the app that provides its users with a positive experience and positive algorithm. 
Broaden horizons with an algorithm that is made for exploration rather than engagement.  
Save videos to playlists to easily find them and replay as many times as you want.  
View more perspectives and join conversations in real time by freely sharing your honest opinions and ideas in a safe space. Bookmark videos for later when you’re short on time.  
Discover the channels which interest you and explore new topics through the positive algorithm. Watch thousands of new videos every day deep dive into your favorite topics and open yourself to discovering new perspectives. Ensure your time online is time well spent. Download Dailymotion.
title: dailymotion video app

description:
Never Have Enough Time to Finish a Movie? Tired of Wasting Money on Subscriptions You Don’t Use?

Watch Kuku TV — Swipe Up for Entertainment!

Say hello to Kuku TV, the next-gen streaming platform designed for your busy life! With exclusive vertical TV mini-series and quick, one-minute episodes, Kuku TV brings drama, romance, and action straight to your phone. Entertainment on the go has never been this exciting—or this easy.

Choose from our massive library of bite-sized originals, with new episodes added daily. Whether you’re craving romantic billionaire tales, epic revenge sagas, or feel-good comeback stories, there’s always something to binge.

Featured Shows:

[I ran away with a hidden CEO]
Trapped by family schemes and forced into a high-stakes marriage, Song Cawei finds an unexpected ally in Sheng Ningyu as they battle betrayal, ambition, and love to reclaim her family's legacy.

[My Husband's other Wife]
After discovering her husband’s affair, Jiang Muxue infiltrates the mistress’s life, only to join forces with her in a daring plot for revenge – with an old flame by her side as her divorce lawye

Why You’ll Love Kuku TV:
	•	Quick, Addictive Originals: Short, snackable episodes perfect for on-the-go viewing.
	•	Fresh Content Daily: New TV mini-series uploaded daily to keep you hooked.
	•	Cinematic Quality: Big-screen entertainment crafted for your small screen.
	•	Interactive Stories: Make decisions that shape the outcome of the story!

Experience the future of entertainment—one minute at a time. Download Kuku TV now!

Follow Us on Social Media:
	•	Instagram: @kukutvusa
	•	YouTube: @KukuTVUSA
	•	TikTok: @kukutvusa

Subscription Information:
	•	Payment: Subscriptions purchased via Apple will be charged to your App Store account upon confirmation.
	•	Access: Enjoy all TV mini-series for free while your subscription is active.
	•	Auto-Renewal: Subscriptions automatically renew. You’ll be charged 24 hours before the start of each period until you cancel.
	•	Cancellation: Cancel at least 24 hours before renewal via Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > Subscriptions > Kuku TV.

Download Kuku TV today and experience entertainment like never before!

Privacy Policy: https://kukufm.com/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://kukufm.com/terms-condition
title: kuku tv

description:
STARZPLAY BRINGS YOU MORE WITH STARZ ON – Your one-stop destination for an unparalleled streaming experience.
Watch thousands of hours of movies, series & digital TV channels, absolutely free - Or Subscribe to STARZPLAY and unlock the latest premium shows, original series, exclusive blockbusters and LIVE sports, choose the plan that suits you best:
STARZPLAY Entertainment – A premium, ad-free experience featuring the latest exclusive hit series like Young Sheldon, The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live, The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon, The Walking Dead: Dead City, Snowpiercer, and more. Enjoy blockbuster movies, Arabic titles, kids’ entertainment, and live TV. Plus, be the first to watch STARZPLAY Originals like Harley, The Promise, Kaboos, Million Dollar Listing UAE, Unstoppable: The Italian Dream, and more.
STARZPLAY MAX – Everything in STARZPLAY Entertainment PLUS live sports, including live and exclusive coverage of Serie A (Italian Football League), Coppa Italia, Eredivisie (Dutch Football League), AD Sports, Cricket, UFC, AEW, and more!
A Personalized Streaming Experience
- Multiple Profiles – Every user gets a unique profile with personalized recommendations for their own customized experience. Share with family while keeping your favorites separate.
- 100% Free Streaming – Watch thousands of ad-supported movies, series, and live TV channels with no subscription required.
- STARZPLAY Store – Buy or rent the latest cinema releases and watch on your terms.
- Fantasy Sports – Play MENA’s first Web 3.0 fantasy sports game with real-time predictions and prizes.
Key Features:
- Watch Instantly – Stream for free or subscribe for premium entertainment and live sports.
- 4K & Offline Streaming – Enjoy ultra-HD quality or download content to watch offline.
- Multi-Device Access – Available on smartphones, tablets, smart TVs, and desktops. Stream on up to 2 screens at once!
- Personalized Recommendations – Our advanced recommendation algorithm suggests content tailored to your preferences, ensuring you never run out of exciting things to watch.
Join the STARZ ON community and discover a world of entertainment right at your fingertips. Download the app today and experience the future of streaming!
Start streaming now!
title: starz on

description:
Con RTVE Play podrás disfrutar de nuevos contenidos y funcionalidades totalmente gratis.   

En RTVE Play tendrás a tu disposición, además de programas exclusivos, todo el contenido disponible en RTVE en directo* y bajo demanda. Accede a tus programas, series, documentales y películas favoritos desde tu dispositivo móvil.  


Funciones principales:  

- Accede a todo el contenido desde RTVE Play, bajo demanda y en directo, de RTVE: La 1, La 2, Teledeporte, Playz y Canal 24 horas.  

- Disfruta de emisiones en directo exclusivas: series, fútbol, baloncesto, tenis, debates, actualidad, etc.  

- Guarda tu contenido favorito para verlo en otro momento y no perderte nada.  

- Continúa exactamente donde lo dejaste. No te preocupes si dejas un contenido a medias, cuando vuelvas, estará donde lo dejaste.  

- Descarga lo que necesites para verlo sin conexión.  

-  Envía tus contenidos desde la aplicación RTVE Play a la televisión para verlo a lo grande.  

- Recibe recomendaciones personalizadas y descubre nuevos programas y películas.  

MasterChef, el Telediario, La Promesa, 4 estrellas, Saber y Ganar, los documentales de La2, Cachitos de Hierro y Cromo, el mejor cine español, Gen Playz, Cocina Bestial, nuestra selección del archivo histórico de TVE y muchos más… ¡te están esperando! 

Si necesitas ayuda, tienes alguna sugerencia o quieres ponerte en contacto con nosotros, puedes escribirnos a play@rtve.es.  


* Algunas de las emisiones en directo pueden sufrir algunas interrupciones debido a restricciones de derechos audiovisuales.
title: RTVE Play
